description:
Bolt is brought back to life for one last job: bringing down Lavion so it can be studied and another ship which defies gravity can be created in its wake. The only problem is that Bolt refuses to be a Mercenary any longer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: วันรุ่งขึ้นที่ไม่มีจุดสิ้นสุด
